title: ⭐ Amusement Club ⭐ RPG Gacha
description:
Amusement Club is a global gacha game for Discord with thousands of cute and fancy cards made by the bot's community. You can get started on any server by typing `->claim` in a bot channel. You will get your first card and special card of the day if you are a new player. Each claim will cost you more tomatoes (in-game currency) `->daily` will reset your claim cost and give you extra tomatoes.

If you need help with setting up bot channel or setting custom prefix on your server, use `->help server`

fields.title: Card Management
fields.description:
->help claim
->help summon
->help cards
->help fav
->help tag
->help draw
->help liq

fields.title: Other
fields.description:
->help sell
->help auction
->help transactions
->help store
->help guild
->help collections

fields.title: Invite bot
fields.description: Please run `->help invite` and read the conditions. Use `->help server` to get information about server related commands

title: About auctions
description: Auctions are a way to trade your cards introduced in `v1.10`. You can put any card on auction for a fee equal to 10% of your listing price, and then other users can bid on it. Each card will be on the auction list for 5 hours and sold to the highest bidder. If nobody bids on your card, your card will return to you, but the listing fee will not be refunded.

fields.title: IMPORTANT
fields.description: Please note that using alt accounts to manipulate auctions in any way may result temporary or even **permanent ban**

fields.title: Searching for cards/collection
fields.description: Use `->auc` or `->auc [card title]` or `->auc [-card collection]` to find the list of current auctions.

fields.title: Selling a card
fields.description:
Command:`->auc sell [card title] :[amount]` will list your card on auction.The lowest possible price is 0.5x eval, while the highest is 4.0x eval. If no amount is given, the eval price is used.
 With Auction House level 3 you can specify time of auction with `->auc sell :-X` where X is 1-10 for hours

fields.title: Bidding on a card
fields.description:
Command: `->auc bid [id] [amount]` For example `->auc bid ktgs4 500` will bid 500 ðŸ… on auction with ID `ktgs4`. You can not bid on your own auction. 
**IMPORTANT**: Place your bids carefully! Your tomatoes will be taken automatically when you place a bid. It will be returned to you when you have been outbid.

fields.title: Finding information on a bid
fields.description: Command:`->auc info [id]` will show you detailed information about that auction auction.

fields.title: Tracking my auctions
fields.description: Command: `->auc -me` This command will show you the auctions you have created.

fields.title: Tracking my bids
fields.description: Command: `->auc -bid` This command will show you the auctions you have bid in.

fields.title: Diamond marks
fields.description:
Auctions in the list has diamond marks on them:
ðŸ”¹ means that you created that auction
ðŸ”¸ means that your bid is leading in this auction
â–ªï¸ means you can bid on this auction.

title: About currencies
description:
This command will show your amount of ðŸ… Tomatoes, ðŸ·Vials and â˜… Stars.
**Tomatoes** are the main currency in game, that are used for card `->claim`, trading, forging, etc. You can get them by completing `->quests` and claiming `->daily`
ðŸ· Vials are the secondary currency used for drawing new cards in servers with upgraded Smith Hubs
**Stars** show you an overall (clean) sum of card stars that you have. This is used mostly for rating and some benefits, like *heroes*

fields.title: Useful to know
fields.description: You can also spend your tomatoes by accepting trade requests from other users (`->help sell`) and selling cards on auction (`->help auc`)

title: About card listing
description: Gets your cards and shows it in several pages. If you have a long card list, use *card filters* to show only cards that you are interested in. See the filters below or read more at `->help query`

fields.title: Useful to know
fields.description:
You can combine any filters in any order. If no cards found, bot will tell you that
To see all collections, run `->col`

fields.title: Show only cards from some collection
Show only cards with certain amount of stars
Show cards that has keyword in the name

title: About bot channels
description: Amusement Club is a discord bot that can read commands from any channel. However, there are some limitations

fields.title: Direct messages
fields.description: You can do most of the commands excapt `->claim`

title: About card claiming
description: You can claim cards as long as you have enough ðŸ… Tomatoes. Claim costs start at 50 tomatoes and increase by 50 each claim. The claim cost goes back to minimum after running `->daily`. Claim cost can be affected by Guilds in the form of taxes. Prices for claims will be adjusted by specific guild tax amounts

fields.title: Locked claims
fields.description: If the server you are claiming on is related to specific fandom/series, that means that only one collection is used for claiming. However, you can always try and claim among all available cards for the bot. Use `->claim any` for that

fields.title: Useful to know
fields.description:
This command can be executed only in bot channel (`->help channel` for more info)
Claim cost can be different for certain *heroes*
Some *effect cards* can reduce claim cost
The message above card shows cost of your next claim and can also include important information about the card

fields.title: Get a random card (can be locked)

title: About collections
description:
Collections or 'fandoms' are sets of cards that have same template and somehow belong to the same origin. Collections can be used for card filtering like [-collectionname]. Collections have name aliases that can be used for search.
You can see the list of all collections or information about certain one using `->col` command

title: About card forging
description:
This command allows you to get new cards using cards that you have. Forge will consume old cards. 
 If you got here with `->help craft` and are looking for craft cards. They are no longer a part of Amusement Club, see `->help (TBD)` for the replacement

fields.title: Forging Cards
fields.description: Can be used to forge cards. You can convert two cards of the same rarity, into a completely new card of the same rarity. The old system of 1+1=2 is gone. New card is completely random, except that if cards that you use for forging are from the same collection (fandom). In this case new card will be also from same collection. These forges cost a percentage of both cards evals + rarity

fields.title: Useful to know
fields.description:
You canâ€™t combine ordinary and craft card
You canâ€™t combine cards of different level
Minimum amount of cards is 2
Craft cards usually contain part of effect card name

title: About daily bonus
description: You can get free **300ðŸ…** Tomatoes every 20 hours(**500ðŸ…** in servers with Guild Bank level 1).

title: About difference
description: Difference is very useful command for trading, that will show you cards that certain user has and you not. It can accept same set of filters as `->cards` command.  Add option `-fav` to include favorite cards.

fields.title: Useful to know
fields.description:
You can combine any filters in any order.
To see all collections, run `->col`

fields.title: Show only cards from some collection
Show only cards with certain amount of stars
Show cards that has keyword in the name

title: About Drawing
description: Drawing is the ability to draw any card currently owned by someone within the bot within the rarities of 1-3â˜… using vials as the drawing medium. Cost of drawing is relative to current eval and card rarity

fields.title: Draw a card of your choosing

title: Effect cards
description: Effects have changed significantly from version 1.0. Craft recipes are gotten from the store, and placed in your inventory. Running `->inv info #` or `->inv info [effectname]` will list the details of the recipe. Such as how long the effect lasts, what the effect does, and what cards are required to create the effect. The recipes are randomly generated and as such each time you go to craft one you are likely to get different card requirements for it.

title: About card pricing
description: Bot evaluates card value depending on amount of stars, type and amount of users that already have it. This is really useful to know the market price of item when trading it.

fields.title: Useful to know
fields.description:
You can use any filters for card search, except `-multi`
Bot uses those values to determine your **give/get ratio** (read more in `->help trade`)

title: Adding cards to favorites
description: You can add any card to favorites. Favorited cards can't be sent and they won't show up for other users in `->has` or `->diff` commands, unless you have 2 or more of those cards or add the `-fav` option

fields.title: Remove many from favorites
fields.description:
->fav remove all [card query]
or
->unfav all [card query]

title: Guild commands
description: You can set custom prefix/bot channels for Amusement Club

fields.title: Show basic information about current guild
Status of finances and buildings. Possible only if guild has **Castle**
Upgrade a building. Grants guild XP to the user who did the upgrade
Allows you to donate your own ðŸ… Tomatoes to the guild's balance (Requires a castle be built first)
Set the claim tax of the guild (owner/manager only)
Set current channel to report channel of the guild. Only one report channel can be set (owner/manager only)
Set current channel as bot. `->guild unset bot` will give an opposite effect (owner/manager only)
Change prefix of bot on current server (owner/manager only)
Set @user as guild manager, allowing them to set guild lock. `->guild remove manager` does the opposite (owner only)

Set current guild lock to specified collection, requires 100,000 ðŸ… Tomatoes to lock, 3,500 ðŸ… Tomatoes/day to upkeep. Can only be set once every 7 days. `->guild unlock` removes the lock (owner/manager only)
Set the minimum rank within the guild needed to build and upgrade buildings (owner/manager only)

title: Learn if user has a card
description: This command will try to find if a user has certain card by name. It is useful when you need to transfer card and would like to make sure target user doesn't have it already. Add option `-fav` to include favorite cards.

title: About Heroes
description: Heroes are user submitted characters that can be upgraded via effect slots. The number of effect slots do not vary between characters. To get a hero requires you to be level 10 in `->profile`. Changing heroes costs 5000 ðŸ… Tomatoes, while submitting heroes for review will cost 1000 ðŸ… Tomatoes. You can gain hero XP globally with daily and using hero effects. Currently Hero level is only used to say 'My waifu is a higher level than yours'

fields.title: Equip a passive effect to a hero
fields.description: ->hero equip [slot number] [effect number], or ->hero equip [slot number] [effect name]

title: About info
description: Info allows you to see more information about a card, such as Price, Global Average Rating, Source, and Tags

fields.title: Get more information about a card

title: About inventory
description: Inventory contains different items that can be used in game. For example, guild buildings. Items can be stored unlimited amount of time.

fields.title: See the list of your items

title: About bot invitation
description: You can add Amusement Club on any other server. Type `->invite` to get an invite link with all permissions set up.

fields.title: Setting up your server
fields.description:
Make sure that your server has a 'bot channel' where Amusement Club can post messages.
`->server info` will show you the list of bot channels. You can set channel to bot by messaging `->server setbot` in that channel. `->server unsetbot` will remove bot perms from current channel.
Don't remove 'send messages' permission from channels where you want `->summon` to work.
If you want to exclude Amusement Club from other bot channel, make sure you remove **both** 'read' and 'send' permissions. If you leave 'read messages' permission on, bot will still read commands, but won't be able to respond which can lead to confusion and loss of tomatoes

fields.title: Channel Privacy (28.05.18)
fields.description:
Bot constantly reads all the messages, however it logs only messages that start with `->`. Feel free to exclude bot from ANY channels, that you want to secure contents of.
**Messages in Logs** can be used by **bot administration** to find bugs/errors and cheaters. In order to secure your channels completely from any bot, make sure that it is **not** present in channels, that may contain any **confidential** information

fields.title: Server administration
fields.description: **Please note**, that bot can be invited only by users that have permission to invite bots to server. If you are NOT target server administrator, send *generated link* to administrator or any person with corresponding role

fields.title: Any questions?
fields.description: If you have any questions regarding bot, please ask them [in bot discord](https://discord.gg/kqgAvdX)

fields.title: Ready to invite?
fields.description: Please, run `->invite` to get a link.

title: About Liquify
description: You can Liquify any card from 1-3â˜… rarity into ðŸ·Vials. The amount of ðŸ·Vials you get is dependent on current Eval price and rarity of card being liquified

fields.title: Liquify a card of your choosing

title: About Miss
description: Miss allows you to view your overall missing cards. If an argument is added you can search within cards you don't have

fields.title: Display all missing cards within a certain argument(ex: -col, -rating, -gif)

title: About Profiles
description: Profiles are a way to quickly and nicely see your current: Level, Card Count, Star Count, Clout Count, Time Since Start, and Bot Roles(if any)

fields.title: How to display someone else's profile

title: Card query
description:
In the help messages you will often see `[card query]`. But what does it mean?
 In Amusement Club you can get cards in any request type (except `forge`) by using different card parameters. Those parameters can be also combined

fields.title: Sort by time when card was accuired

title: Card Ratings
description: Players can rate their cards and view those ratings or even sort by them. Players' ratings are averaged into a global average rating that can be seen with ->info [card]

fields.title: Rate one of your cards from 1 to 10.

title: Bot rules
description: Please follow these rules when trading and interacting with other players. Ignoring the rules can lead to embargo or ban

fields.title: Direct Trading
fields.description: There are no commands to gift another player tomatoes nor cards. This is on purpose. Behavior that aims to bypass these restrictions is prohibited.

fields.title: Auction Bidding
fields.description: The only reason you should bid on an auction is if you want to collect that card or resell it to a collector.

fields.title: Multiple Accounts
fields.description: This is only allowed if your accounts do not interact with each other.

fields.title: Play nice
fields.description:
Donâ€™t be annoying or rude towards other players.
Use ID instead of ping when possible.

title: About cards selling
description: Users can sell cards either to bot or to other users. In both cases prices are defined by bot.

fields.title: Sell a card to BOT
fields.description: Use `->sell [card query]` to sell cards that you don't need. You get ðŸ… tomatoes based on a percentage of eval for selling to bot. You do not get full eval

fields.title: Sell a card to USER
fields.description: Use `->sell @user [card query]` to sell a card to user. Target user will be asked to confirm or decline your transaction. You can **not** send more than 5 requests to the same user. Selling price is decided by bot using **eval algorithm**. You can always run `->eval [card query]` to find out card cost before trading it

fields.title: Getting into Debt
fields.description: If someone sells you a card for more tomatoes than you own, you will find yourself in **debt**. You will need to come out of debt before you can trade with others. You **can** however, daily and sell cards to come out of debt.

title: About store
description: The store is where you can buy blueprints for guilds, and recipes for effects. To browse the store use the `category` name or number,  with the commands below.

fields.title: Get info on a specific item in the store

title: About card summon
description:
You can summon card in any channel on server, but only if you have this card. This operation won't consume card.
You can include partial name of the card, but it has to be more than 3 characters long. The system will try to find *most suitable card* using name you provided

title: About tagging
description: You can tag cards with #tags to help you and the playerbase better find cards. Adding a tag already on a card upvotes the tag

fields.title: Upvote or Add a tag to a card
Downvote a tag on a card

title: About transaction history
description:
You can review your transaction history; this includes sells and auctions. Transactions older than a week will be erased.
If transaction was done via auction, you can also get auction details using TransactionID `->auc info [transaction_id]`

fields.title: List of the transactions where you get a card
List of the transactions where you sent a card
List of the transactions that are waiting for confirmations
Gets detailed info about transaction using TransactionID
